column4: LCD CPU Panel Write Data Register
LCD CPU Panel Read Data Register0
LCD CPU Panel Read Data Register1
LCD CEU Coefficient Register0 0x0110+N*0x04 (N=0..10) N=0: Rr, N=1: Rg, N=2: Rb, N=4: Gr, N=5: Gg, N=6: Gb, N=8: Br, N=9: Bg, N=10: Bb
LCD CEU Coefficient Register1 0x011C+N*0x10 (N=0,1,2) N=0: Rc, N=1: Gc, N=2: Bc

LCD Color Map Odd Line Register1
